name: Date-and-Apple Pie
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 cups Granny Smith apples, peeled, cored and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Roll the dough out to a disk 11 inches in diameter and ease it into a 9-inch pie pan. Trim the edges.

Sprinkle the sugar, cinnamon and 2 tablespoons of water over the dates and apples, and mix well. Transfer to the pie pan. Top with 1 cup of the crumb recipe. Bake until the filling bubbles, about 60 minutes.
